title: Market Transmission Congestion Alert
description: A trader receives an alert about potential transmission congestion on a key path. They need to assess the impact on their wind farm's ability to export power.

tasks.description: Retrieve the real-time Locational Marginal Prices (LMPs) for the wind farm's node and the downstream load zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fetches the LMPs and shows a significant negative price spread.

tasks.description: Analyze the ISO's market notifications to understand the cause and expected duration of the congestion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the cause as an unplanned transmission line outage with an ETR of 4 hours.

tasks.description: Adjust the wind farm's bid strategy for the next 4 hours to reduce its output and avoid selling power at a loss.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits a revised bid to the ISO.
